short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bible quotes for your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with Bible Tab. This Chrome extension displays an inspiring Bible quote every time you open a new tab. Find daily encouragement and spiritual guidance from a collection of verses drawn from the Old and New Testaments. Stay motivated and uplifted as you browse the web, one tab at a time!
